term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Recognizes the formation of the Friends of Israel Initiative and affirms its founding goals.
Reaffirms bipartisan support for: (1) the alliance and friendship between the governments and peoples of the United States and Israel; (2) Israel's security and right to self-defense; and (3) Israel's right to exist as a democratic Jewish state.
